critic_filtered_lessons.lesson: fluxtool GROUP syntax requires '=>' operator followed by alias=func(column) pairs separated by commas; aggregation functions must be lowercase (sum, count, avg, min, max)
fluxtool SORT command uses directional keywords 'up' or 'down' instead of ASC/DESC; 'down' sorts descending by numeric values
fluxtool file paths in IMPORT statements must be enclosed in double quotes; unquoted paths will fail
fluxtool DISPLAY without arguments renders all aggregated rows after GROUP/SORT; no LIMIT clause syntax exists in fluxtool

critic_raw_lessons.lesson: fluxtool GROUP syntax requires '=>' operator followed by alias=func(column) pairs separated by commas; aggregation functions must be lowercase (sum, count, avg, min, max)
fluxtool SORT command uses directional keywords 'up' or 'down' instead of ASC/DESC; 'down' sorts descending by numeric values
fluxtool file paths in IMPORT statements must be enclosed in double quotes; unquoted paths will fail
fluxtool DISPLAY without arguments renders all aggregated rows after GROUP/SORT; no LIMIT clause syntax exists in fluxtool

task:
fluxtool task: aggregate_report_holdout.

Goal:
1) Import sales data from fixture.csv
2) Group by region, computing total amount and transaction count
3) Sort by total amount in descending order
4) Display all results

Constraints:
- Use only run_fluxtool and show_fixture tools.
- fluxtool has its own syntax and operator words — it is NOT SQL and not gridtool.
